mapper.select: SELECT * from air a, room r where a.roomid=r.rid and a.toroom=0 and r.rid=#{roomid}
mapper.sql: id, name, temperature, airscene, status, windspeed, electricity, hour, roomid, airimg, sid, toroom
mapper.insert:

id,
name,
temperature,
airscene,
status,
windspeed,
electricity,

roomid,

mapper.update:
update air
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
airscene = #{airscene,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
windspeed = #{windspeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
electricity = #{electricity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hour = #{hour,jdbcType=INTEGER},
roomid = #{roomid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
airimg = #{airimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
toroom = #{toroom,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
